start=(3000,3000,3000,4450)
data=((550,560),(550,1650))
end=(550,20000)

冷开start+data(10100110,10100010,00000000,00000000,01000000,10100000,00000000,00100000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000101,01001101)+end
冷关start+data(10100110,10100000,00000000,00000000,00000000,10100000,00000000,00100000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000101,00001011)+end
热开start+data(10100110,10100010,00000000,00000000,11000000,01100000,00000000,10000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000101,11101101)+end
热关start+data(10100110,10100000,00000000,00000000,00000000,01100000,00000000,10000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000000,00000101,00101011)+end
